item.description:
Teun Voeten will make an informal presentation reflecting on current world events and his 20+ years as a foreign correspondent, photojournalist and anthropologist. Please take a look at his web site at :http://www.teunvoeten.com to check out his photographs and read his words. This will be an interesting evening with a great discussion. We hope you can join us.

 

This is a free event, open to everyone, put together by The Fruitlands Museum but they always say donations are appreciated...
item.how_to_find_us: We will be gathering in the Wayside Education Center, please join us.

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: Foreign Correspondent & Photojournalist Teun Voeten to Speak at Fruitlands Museu
